tipiclass.name: rss
tipiclass.description: This connector connects to a rss source.\\ - Call 'InitRss'\\ - set the URL property at {propertyref:/InitRss:/Rss/URL}\\ - Call Rss.\\ - The Rss navajo object will contain the entries, in an array message named 'Rss'\\ - The Rss navajo object also contains a 'Channel' message with channel info. \\
